React, sync
React, sync
Lots operator of tech debt reduction.

Lots of tech debt reduction. build improvement: You can build outside the GOPATH, detects your best build option, go or docker, builds images using s2i or docker. Elimated the use of OpenShift templates, we only use mustache templates now. Vendor the operator dependencies: simplifies downstream build and protects us from dependencies disapearing on us. Updating the syndesis operator to conform more to the default operator-sdk v0.8.0 file layout and build strategy.  You can use the operator-sdk to build this operator. Mustache templates can use CRDs which not registered with the operator.
